subject: Shipping to Poland
description_text:
Hello on your website i can’t find Poland in checkout. Is it possible for
you to enable it? I have seen your products on other websites but it seems
to be the cheapest on your website so i would like to order it using
simsonn.com

conversations.body_text: Hi Zdzisław Czerniejewski,  Customers in Poland can place orders directly through our Polish distributor, and the products will be shipped locally from Poland  https:/fmic.pl/elektronika/simracing?product_brand=Simsonn
